faq.a: Perfect binding requires a minimum of 48 pages to create a readable spine.
faq.q: What is the minimum page count for perfect binding?

faq.a: Yes. We recommend heavier cover stock (80–100 lb) with lighter interior (60–80 lb).
faq.q: Can I have a different paper for cover vs interior?

faq.a: Yes. Gloss UV, matte laminate, soft touch, and spot UV are all available for covers.
faq.q: Do you offer UV coating on covers?

faq.a: Standard turnaround for 1,000 magazines is 7–10 business days from approved proof.
faq.q: What turnaround should I expect for 1,000 magazines?

faq.a: Yes, Pantone matching is available for covers and spot color elements.
faq.q: Can you match Pantone colors for my brand?
